name: CareSoft
description: CareSoft is an Omnichannel Contact Center platform, the software is a SaaS solution highly usable and have a broad, deep set of multichannel customer service  included strong omnichannel capabilities of Voice, IVR, ACD, dialers, email, chat, and social media. Caresoft aims to make customer service easier and more efficient, offering a rapid time-to-value and helping business to understanding the customer journey, delivering omni-channel experience, continuous customer service and transition to new business models. Caresoft unifies various methods of communication, and streamlines their uses, ultimately making the customer service platform simpler and more intuitive.
focus_areas: Customer Service & Sales Force Automation Platform
Customer Engagement, CRM & Quản lý chiến dịch
